src:
Volvos nödlösning blev nyckelspelare: ”Vi är som landslaget”
Största teknikkonsulten hos Volvo Cars startade som en nödlösning. Nu har Netgroup 20 års erfarenhet av det som hela branschen pratar om – samarbete. ”Klart det varit gnissel ibland, men det har utvecklat oss”, säger Per Skogum, vd i nätverksbolaget.
03 Nov 2019, 11:06 by Karin Olander

text:
Volvo's emergency solution became key player: "We are like the national team"
Volvo Cars' largest technology consultant started as an emergency solution. Now Netgroup has 20 years of experience in what the entire industry is talking about - collaboration. "Sure there has been grunts sometimes, but it has developed us," says Per Skogum, CEO of the network company.
03 Nov 2019, 11:06 by Karin Olander
